ygData.subject: Re: OOC - On Yoketron
ygData.msgSnippet: I like the idea that Tucson, Nightshift and Straight Shot are not aware of Yoketron s death, that would make it interesting. I think I d like to roll with

I like the idea that Tucson, Nightshift and Straight Shot are not aware of =
Yoketron's death, that would make it interesting. I think I'd like to roll =
with that.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Oct 28, 2011,=
 at 12:19 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> Basically =
I am using a lot of the animated events in the background
> events of Cyber=
tron. Basically the world went from G1/G2 to Animated
> to Beast Wars back =
on old Earth - Beast Machines never happened.
> 
> So for Yokatron: (Yes I =
am stealing the name Prowl-Z from Adam for the
> name of the animated versi=
on of Prowl, I hope he doesn't mind)
> 
> ***************
> Yoketron is a w=
ise old Autobot responsible for training the Autobot
> Cyber-Ninja Corps at=
 the Cyber-Ninja Dojo, but more importantly, he
> protects the Autobots' ca=
che of protoforms, which will have to be
> activated if Project Omega fails=
. He is a master of many martial arts,
> including Circuit-Su, Metallikato,=
 Crystalocution, diffusion,
> Tekkaido, Tahtib-tron and Laser Lathi.
> 
> O=
ne of Yoketron's former students, Lockdown, betrayed him, stealing
> most o=
f the protoforms for the Decepticons, and leaving Yoketron to
> die. Prowl-=
Z returned during the aftermath, and he attempted to revive
> Yoketron by t=
ransferring his spark to a protoform that had been left
> behind. Though Yo=
ketron formed from the new Protoform, Yoketron
> chastised Prowl-Z for not =
accepting fate, telling him he "...must not
> sacrifice a piece of the futu=
re to bring back the past." As he told
> Prowl-Z that he would understand w=
hen his time came, Yoketron
> relinquished his spark, and his new body gray=
ed.
> **************
> 
> So yes Yoketron is dead, killed by Lockdown, howe=
ver that leaves
> several things open - In who's employ was Lockdown, it co=
uld easily
> have been BLUDGEON. The manner of Yoketron's death has been ke=
pt from
> the public at large. In fact I would imagine that the story is th=
at
> since he was considered old, that he sucummed to the ravages of time.
=
> MOST PEOPLE BELIEVE THIS STORY.
> 
> I am unsure at what point Tuscon and=
 Nightshift left the Dojo and came
> to Earth, so he may not be aware that =
Yoketron is dead, or if he is,
> he may not know how. I will leave that up =
to Sandy how much Tuscon and
> Nightshift know and how much they may have t=
old Straight Shot.
> 
> However the revelation that Bludgeon could have bee=
n behind it, or
> even part of of it at all would be new knowledge. Most wi=
ll not have
> any knowledge unless they have some special connection to som=
eone who
> was in on matters, or was in it themselves.
> 
> I invite questi=
ons and/or comments.
> 
> - Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-62-64923318

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>I like the idea that Tucson, Nightshif=
t and Straight Shot are not aware of Yoketron's death, that would make it i=
nteresting. I think I'd like to roll with that.<br><br>Perpetually on the m=
ove and constantly busy. </div><div><br>On Oct 28, 2011, at 12:19 PM, =
Super Cyclonus <<a href=3D"mailto:supercyclonus@...">supercyclonus=
@...</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><div></div><blockquote type=3D"cite"=
><div>




<span style=3D"display:none"> </span>



    <div id=3D"ygr=
p-text">
      
      
      <p>Basically I am using a lot of the animated =
events in the background<br>
events of Cybertron. Basically the world went =
from G1/G2 to Animated<br>
to Beast Wars back on old Earth - Beast Machines=
 never happened.<br>
<br>
So for Yokatron: (Yes I am stealing the name Prow=
l-Z from Adam for the<br>
name of the animated version of Prowl, I hope he =
doesn't mind)<br>
<br>
***************<br>
Yoketron is a wise old Autobot r=
esponsible for training the Autobot<br>
Cyber-Ninja Corps at the Cyber-Ninj=
a Dojo, but more importantly, he<br>
protects the Autobots' cache of protof=
orms, which will have to be<br>
activated if Project Omega fails. He is a m=
aster of many martial arts,<br>
including Circuit-Su, Metallikato, Crystalo=
cution, diffusion,<br>
Tekkaido, Tahtib-tron and Laser Lathi.<br>
<br>
One =
of Yoketron's former students, Lockdown, betrayed him, stealing<br>
most of=
 the protoforms for the Decepticons, and leaving Yoketron to<br>
die. Prowl=
-Z returned during the aftermath, and he attempted to revive<br>
Yoketron b=
y transferring his spark to a protoform that had been left<br>
behind. Thou=
gh Yoketron formed from the new Protoform, Yoketron<br>
chastised Prowl-Z f=
or not accepting fate, telling him he "...must not<br>
sacrifice a piece of=
 the future to bring back the past." As he told<br>
Prowl-Z that he would u=
nderstand when his time came, Yoketron<br>
relinquished his spark, and his =
new body grayed.<br>
**************<br>
<br>
So yes Yoketron is dead, kille=
d by Lockdown, however that leaves<br>
several things open - In who's emplo=
y was Lockdown, it could easily<br>
have been BLUDGEON. The manner of Yoket=
ron's death has been kept from<br>
the public at large. In fact I would ima=
gine that the story is that<br>
since he was considered old, that he sucumm=
ed to the ravages of time.<br>
MOST PEOPLE BELIEVE THIS STORY.<br>
<br>
I a=
m unsure at what point Tuscon and Nightshift left the Dojo and came<br>
to =
Earth, so he may not be aware that Yoketron is dead, or if he is,<br>
he ma=
y not know how. I will leave that up to Sandy how much Tuscon and<br>
Night=
shift know and how much they may have told Straight Shot.<br>
<br>
However =
the revelation that Bludgeon could have been behind it, or<br>
even part of=
 of it at all would be new knowledge. Most will not have<br>
any knowledge =
unless they have some special connection to someone who<br>
was in on matte=
rs, or was in it themselves.<br>
<br>
I invite questions and/or comments.<b=
r>
<br>
-  Preston<br>
</p>

    </div>
